1101110000101010 1101000000110010 1 -> sum: 1010110001011101, cout: 1
1000110111101000 1101011011111010 1 -> sum: 0110010011100011, cout: 1
1000011010110000 0000011011000011 1 -> sum: 1000110101110100, cout: 0
0110000100101101 0100100001100001 0 -> sum: 1010100110001110, cout: 0
1111010101111100 0011011110100000 0 -> sum: 0010110100011100, cout: 1
1001111100110101 0000010010111001 1 -> sum: 1010001111101111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
